Common difference of the A.P. is
\(d= a_2 - a_1 =a_3 - a_2= _{q}_\)
if Sum of n terms is \(S_n\)
\(S_n=\frac{n}{2}\times (2a_1+(n-1)\times d)\)
Manipulating this equation we get
\(n^2d+(2a_1-d)n-2S_n=0\)
Solving this quadratic equation we get n = _{r}_
